definitions.title: n.[f.]
definitions.body: sf. [[נְחֻשְׁתֵּח]] Ez Eze 16:36 where context (‖[[עֶרְוׇה]]) favours mng. lust, harlotry, or specif. sens. obscoen. (Co [citing Ki Ra] Berthol, v. also Da); text perh. crpt. (cf. Nö:ZMG xl (1886). 730); Sm prop. [[תַּזְנוּתַיִךְ]], so appar. Toy:Hpt; Or [[בָּשְׁתֵּךְ]].
